duties_responsibilities.duty: Working on problems that affect the lives of real people and making positive changes to their health and lives.
Basing work on scientifically-proven, peer-reviewed methodologies designed by medical professionals.
Collaborating with a team both onsite and offsite, and utilizing Python and SQL to analyze data and run statistical tests.
Using data science to drive business strategy and building successful stakeholder relationships across a range of teams.
Explaining complex data concepts to non-technical stakeholders, both in writing and live conversations.
Applying statistical analysis techniques, such as regressions and decision trees, to do analysis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
